CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 14, 1953, pg. 7 reads: "Interracial Communion - Four Baptist Churches of the Homewood District conducted an interracial Communion Service at the Homewood Baptist Church, Sunday, Feb. 8, at 8 P.M. Left to right: the Revs. H.H. Gaines, Community Baptist; W.D. Petett, Nazarene; G. Forrest Sparks, Homewood Baptist, and J.A. Williams, Baptist Temple.  The sermon was delivered by the Rev. H.H. Gaines.  Music was furnished by the choirs of the participating churches. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four clergymen, from left: Rev. H.H. Gaines, W.D. Petett, G. Forrest Sparks, and J.A. Williams  shaking hands behind table with stacked plates of communal wafers, in Homewood Baptist Church, another version
